quest.twr.33B6E7B60783C72B.description.1: Water in your body is very important.
quest.twr.33B6E7B60783C72B.description.2: &6The water bag you found in your ship can be used to right-click on water source to fill water
quest.twr.33B6E7B60783C72B.description.3: &6But this is unpurified water, and you will be thirsty after drinking it.
quest.twr.33B6E7B60783C72B.description.4: In order to avoid the thirst, you should drink purified water. The pure water stock you have at the beginning is enough for you to drink for a while
quest.twr.33B6E7B60783C72B.description.5: After you get the water filter or a campfire, you can purify or boil for the pure water.
quest.twr.33B6E7B60783C72B.subtitle: One cannot live without water
quest.twr.33B6E7B60783C72B.title: Drinking

quest.twr.348EB1588EFAD2AB.subtitle: Rough machining

quest.twr.3B5663CF194B054C.description.2: When your body temperature get to a dangerous situation, you experience bar would become body temperature indicator, &c&land you would get harm after it become completly red&r.
quest.twr.3B5663CF194B054C.description.3: You should find a &6&lShelter from wind and rain&r ASAP and &6&llight up a campfire&r to maintain body temperature.
quest.twr.3B5663CF194B054C.description.4: Avoid drenched in snow or soaked in water, this make you become &b&lwet&r and easily lost body temperature.
quest.twr.3B5663CF194B054C.description.5: Maybe you will need instruments to measure various temperatures later
quest.twr.3B5663CF194B054C.description.7: &6&lPlanting plants probably needs a heating device!
quest.twr.3B5663CF194B054C.description.9: &c&lPlease read this quest patiently as this is of great importance.
